channel.title: Projects on measured.
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on measured.

item.title: how I organise my thoughts and time
item.description: my current systems Updated: 2018-09-04 (I wonder if all or some of this should move to the dontpanic readme.) current tweaks switch \(\Phi, \theta, \varphi\) after planning \(\cdot\) pieces piano practice/task switching/pomodoor bullet journal, used to be as portable as possible blog to see if I’ve made any progress on my study problems for today, to track my productivity system, and to learn about my research problems; in short, blog for me, don’t worry about anyone else: but keep it to those three categories; one category per post, etc.

item.title: measures.
item.description: I like Newport’s term deep work. How I’m going today: Table 1: today’s goals type poms goal success phi 0 6 FALSE theta 0 3 FALSE varphi 0 3 FALSE ## # A tibble: 6 x 18 ## date daily_review food mood phi theta varphi pom goals ## <date> <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <int> <chr> ## 1 2018-08-29 started good okay 6 0 6 20 comp… ## 2 2018-08-30 nope <NA> <NA> 0 0 0 NA <NA> ## 3 2018-08-31 nope <NA> <NA> 0 0 0 NA <NA> ## 4 2018-09-01 started good <NA> 3.

item.title: news
item.description: events in 2018 event date role Evidence Synthesis Hackathon La Trobe University Choose Maths day June 4 10 minute speech to school children about the Japanese concept of ikigai and how I find ikigai in practicing mathematical science and a panel session Q & A. useR! 2018
